QueryResult.text: SELECT V0.USER_ID, V0.OBJECT_ID, V0.OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID, V0.PERMISSION_CODE, V0.PERMISSION_VALUE, O.OBJECT_CODE, O.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE OBJECT_TYPE, O.COMPONENT_CODE, U.USER_NAME FROM CMN_SEC_CHK_USER_INST_V0 V0, CMN_SEC_OBJECTS O, CMN_SEC_USERS U WHERE O.ID = V0.OBJECT_ID AND U.ID = V0.USER_ID
